CustomField.description: will be set to true only when Cadence type is “Inbound-Forms” or “Inbound -Oasis”
CustomField.formula:
If(CASE(Cadence_Type__c,"Inbound-Forms", "True", "Inbound-Oasis", "True", "SMB INB", "True", "False") = "True", true, false)
/*IF((ISPICKVAL(Cadence_Type__c , "Inbound-Forms") || ISPICKVAL(Cadence_Type__c , "Inbound-Oasis")|| ISPICKVAL(Cadence_Type__c , "SMB INB")), true, false) */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates this is an Inbound Cadence and the Lead or Contact Stage will be set to Recycle with a reason of Cadence Completed if the sales rep completes all of the assigned steps
CustomField.label: Recycle Lead/Contact
